Details of front hedge and landscaping pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission ref: 250363HH dated 09/05/2025 for: Excavation to provide extension to basement with lightwells to front and side (following demolition of existing basement); single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); replacement of existing dormer roof window to elevation b (following demolition of existing dormer roof window); replacement of all single-glazed windows with timber-frame, double-glazed conservation-style windows; replacement of the timber boundary fence in the rear garden; installation of PV solar panels; installation of air conditioning unit to elevation B flat roof; alterations to elevation C fenestrations involving removal of rooflights, installation of two rooflights; alterations to existing roof to elevation C; construction of timber bin store to front garden; associated external and internal alterations
T1 Horse chestnut tree - reduce height by 1 - 1.5m back to previous points, reduce sides by 1 - 1.5m, thin top branch structure by 5%, remove major deadwood.
T1- Robina: Crown reduce by 30%. To contain crown spread and help improve light into garden
T1 Beech- Reduce back to previous reduction points or approx. 1-2m.
